speech: Welcome to our restaurant! How can I assist you today? Feel free to say 'new order' or 'track order.'
Greetings! We're here to serve you. Let us know if you'd like to place a 'new order' or check on an existing 'track order.'
Hello! We're delighted to have you here. Do you wish to make a 'new order' or inquire about an existing 'track order.'
Hey there! We're at your service. Just tell us if you'd like to start a 'new order' or inquire about an 'existing order.'
Hi! It's great to see you. How may we assist you today? Simply say 'new order' or 'track order' to get started.
